name: Overcharged (Nerys, Matthew Bland, TheEpicStef)
description:
A short Puzzle-Platformer with PS1 Aesthetics, comprising of three levels.

Take control of a Stone Golem to explore beautiful ancient ruins, solve puzzles, and collect (or not) powerups to aid you in your journey.

Best played with a controller.

[Created for a Games for Impact assignment]
